column4: guys i just installed ubuntu, just to realize that as far as i know their is no support for my cannon pixma MP480. Has this changed or do i have to go back to 'shutters' vista?
my canon printer only recently got supported.
looks like no support. no drivers found.. ;( I dont want to go back :(((
they used to have 'paid comercial' drivers at one time. Personally i WONT be buying another canon printer any time soon.
canon is bad about givbing out info on their printers to the public
it might be able to use drivers for a similer printer. check th forums perhaps?
i found windoss 7 lacking in a great many printer drivers also.
Well i ran mine no problem
aparently my 'plc5' standard laser printer isent imporntant enough to bother to include drivers any more.
so you got a verry pricy laser that dont work?
just the opposite.. :) a 14 yr old Workhorse.. that keeps chugging along..   drivers have been included  in windows for it for 14 years
picture a scanner and printer both plugged into a usb hub. :)
i did have a neat printer/scanner that worked like a photocopier. :)
